findings.title: A01.Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens?
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of Sundae tokens.

findings.title: A03.Unprotected access to critical functions
findings.description: Unprotected access to critical functions can lead to unauthorized modification or exploitation of the contract's state.

findings.title: A04.Insecure use of transfer and approve functions
findings.description: Insecure usage of transfer and approve functions can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: A05.Lack of reentrancy protection in swapAndLiquify function
findings.description: The swapAndLiquify function lacks reentrancy protection, which can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: A06.Unvalidated user input in constructor
findings.description: The constructor function does not properly validate user input, which can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Possible front-running attacks on liquidity adding
